word_mean: 耸立在主峰前的岩石或山

sentence.Network_en: He sought to buttress some of his arguments with quotations from Mein Kampf.
sentence.Network_cn: 他引用《我的奋斗》中的语录来论证自己的观点。

sentence.Network_en: She would continue, faithful and reliable, to buttress up Miss Bulstrode's successor.
sentence.Network_cn: 她会继续干下去, 忠心而可靠, 给接替布尔斯特罗德小姐的人以支持.

sentence.Network_en: The massive - head buttress dam has some attractive features for certain locations.
sentence.Network_cn: 大头支墩坝对于某些地区仍有其值得注意的特色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 扶壁(Buttress),也称扶拱垛,是一种用来分担主墙压力的辅助设施,在罗曼式建筑中即已得到大量运用。 但哥特式建筑把原本实心的、被屋顶遮盖起来的扶壁,都露在.
骨科词汇 - 豆丁网 ... catastrophic adj. 悲惨的, 灾难的 buttress n. (建筑)扶壁, 支持物 vt. 支持, (以扶壁)扶住.
butterfly valve 蝶形阀buttress 支墩buzzer 蜂音器；蜂鸣器
buttress 支撑buttress 支座buttseam 接缝

list.abs: ...buttoned-down pleated front skirt 前身中间上下钉钮的褶裥裙buttress jackscrew 锯齿型起重螺杆-
机械词汇的英语翻译(A-G) ... button switch 按钮头式开关 buttress thread 锯齿螺纹 bwr 沸腾水型堆.
飞扶壁(flying buttress)： 就是扶持墙壁的意思。就是为了平衡拱券对外墙的推力，而在外墙上附加的墙或其他结构。
生物科学词汇（简体） ... burette 滴定管 buttress root 板根 ;板状根 by-product 副产品.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French (ars) bouterez 'thrusting (arch'), from boter 'to strike or thrust' (see butt)

entry.def: Buttresses are supports, usually made of stone or brick, that support a wall.

entry.tran: 加强（论点或制度）；支持（某人）
entry.def: To buttress an argument, system, or person means to give them support and strength.

example.ex: He sought to buttress some of his arguments with quotations from Mein Kampf...
example.tran: 他引用《我的奋斗》中的语录来论证自己的观点。

example.ex: The president's tough line is, however, buttressed by a democratic mandate.
example.tran: 然而，总统推行的强硬路线受到了民主党发布的训令的支持。

means.word_mean: 1. a support usually of stone or brick; supports the wall of a building

auth_sentence.content: Jonathan Davies Half of a centre buttress that was impregnable post-Ireland.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jonathan Davies Half of a centre buttress that was impregnable post-Ireland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jonathan Davies Half of a centre buttress that was impregnable post-Ireland.

auth_sentence.content: At this corner the architect had to provide a heavy buttress against a double strain.
auth_sentence.res_content: At this corner the architect had to provide a heavy buttress against a double strain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At this corner the architect had to provide a heavy buttress against a double strain.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"物品"; 2. 表名词,"女性"

stems_affixes.word_buile: butt树桩+ress物品→n.扶墙,拱壁 v.支持
fort堡垒+ress通常表示女性,这里表示凹进去→n.堡垒,要塞
wait等候+ress女性→n.女侍者,女服务员
butt树桩+ress物品→n.扶墙,拱壁 v.支持

sentences.en: a buttress supporting the church wall
